name: ARAnchor
desc: An object that specifies the position and orientation of an item in the physical environment.

items.name: init(transform: simd_float4x4)
items.desc: Creates a new anchor object with the specified transform.

items.name: init(name: String, transform: simd_float4x4)
items.desc: Creates a new anchor object with the specified transform and a descriptive name.

items.name: var name: String?
items.desc: A descriptive name for the anchor.

items.name: var identifier: UUID
items.desc: A unique identifier for the anchor.

items.name: var sessionIdentifier: UUID?
items.desc: The unique identifier of the session that owns this anchor.

items.name: var transform: simd_float4x4
items.desc: A matrix encoding the position, orientation, and scale of the anchor relative to the world coordinate space of the AR session the anchor is placed in.
